[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@threebird/loader-3d-tiles](./loader-3d-tiles.md) &gt; [LoaderOptions](./loader-3d-tiles.loaderoptions.md) &gt; [debug](./loader-3d-tiles.loaderoptions.debug.md)

## LoaderOptions.debug property

Debug mode: Show tile bounding boxes. Make sure to add the boxes to the scene from [Runtime.getTileBoxes()](./loader-3d-tiles.runtime.gettileboxes.md) - Default: `false`

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
debug?: boolean;
```
